title: Alpha Client No Riot Points or IP
body: i was accepted into the alpha tester and I download everything but when I sign in I don't have the riot points or influence points that its suppose to give you to buy champs and skins to test things out so I'm not sure if its something new or whatever cause usally ive seen that that's what it gives the rp and ip to see new skins and champs styles

replies.body: The Alpha client uses your Live account, and not a temporary or PBE account.  Anything that your purchase or play will be the same between Live and the current version.  If you have any concerns about the alpha, hit up the [alpha community](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) on the boards.  Thanks for testing!

For the Alpha you are still using your normal account(s), I just got accepted today (well yesterday now, past midnight). 
They are different things, no free RP/IP for us I'm afraid :(
